title: Looking for a team  (experienced gamer)
body:
Hi,

Add me i will be available to add/reply in the Lol App.

i've  played dota 2 competitive for 3-4 years on a high skilled gaming enviroment of MMR's 4000+ which is equivalent to a plat or dia.

If i was doing okay then what got me into league?
- the fact that the games are much much faster instead of a 90 - 120 min game, i can play leage for 20min max 40 and win a game.

Currently i was bronze 1 and moving up, i started season 5 apparently during the off season where ranked didnt count but it would still rank you. I was ranked gold 1 and was moving up untill it reset...that was funny.


I play mid and jungle or even adc but prefer the first two.

Mid heros are; azir fizz tf anivia annie brand leblanc lee...probably missing a few but cant think of them right now.

Jung: i highly play lee but i can play yi, zac, elise, wukong and j4

Bot: not much hero pool but i play vaybe lucian and jinx


Add me idc what rank team you are tbh but prefer gold + teams..i will accept any request as long as you're passionate

Have a nice day :)

replies.body: Hey man srry i didnt add u last night i forgot i do it now

It's all good, add me when you can, cant promise i will always look at this forum lol

If you have an iphone download the app called (lol friends) its free, its pretty useful to stay in contact with your team.
